sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>An upgrade script for Qubec</description> <name>DemandManagementQubecUpgrade</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var start = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Starting of DemandManagementQubecUpgrade , time : "+start); var dmnMgmtQHelper = new DemandManagementQubecUpdateHelper(); dmnMgmtQHelper.setProjectCalcluationType(); var end = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Ending of DemandManagementQubecUpgrade , time : "+end); gs.log("Total time taken for DemandManagementQubecUpgrade in millisecs : "+(end.getNumericValue() - start.getNumericValue())); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-08-13 08:03:57</sys_created_on> <sys_id>88ccfb1ec72210103e0d0ba4c7c260a1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>DemandManagementQubecUpgrade</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Demand Management" source="com.snc.demand_management">82005a2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4346</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_88ccfb1ec72210103e0d0ba4c7c260a1</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-03 15:48:44</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
